articles.title: Jensen Huang Declares 'A New Industrial Revolution Has Started': Sees 100x To 1000x Compute Demand Surge - $3-$4 Trillion 'Opportunity' For Nvidia
articles.summary: Chipmaker NVIDIA Corp.'s (NASDAQ: NVDA) CEO, Jensen Huang, just announced an optimistic vision for the future of artificial intelligence during the company's second-quarter earnings call on Wednesday.
articles.translated_title: Jensen Huang Declares 'A New Industrial Revolution Has Started': Sees 100x To 1000x Compute Demand Surge - $3-$4 Trillion 'Opportunity' For Nvidia
articles.translated_summary: Chipmaker NVIDIA Corp.'s (NASDAQ: NVDA) CEO, Jensen Huang, just announced an optimistic vision for the future of artificial intelligence during the company's second-quarter earnings call on Wednesday.

articles.title: Asia markets waver, Nvidia drops after earnings beat
articles.summary: Asian stocks wobbled on Thursday as blowout earnings from artificial intelligence bellwether Nvidia were offset by worries over the outlook for its China business, while the dollar remained shaky as investors bet on a near-term rate cut.
articles.translated_title: Asia markets waver, Nvidia drops after earnings beat
articles.translated_summary: Asian stocks wobbled on Thursday as blowout earnings from artificial intelligence bellwether Nvidia were offset by worries over the outlook for its China business, while the dollar remained shaky as investors bet on a near-term rate cut.

articles.title: Study says AI chatbots need to fix suicide response, as family sues over ChatGPT role in boy‚Äôs death
articles.summary: A study of how three popular artificial intelligence chatbots respond to queries about suicide found that they generally avoid answering questions that pose the highest risk to the user, such as for specific how-to guidance.

articles.title: ‚ÄòReal possibility‚Äô Nvidia brings Blackwell AI chip to China
articles.summary: Huang predicted the artificial intelligence market in the world's second-biggest economy will grow 50% next year.

articles.title: Will AI Make an Elite College Degree Worthless?
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence could break the traditional status ladder to success. That could mean more social mobility ‚Äì or a lost generation.
articles.translated_title: Will AI Make an Elite College Degree Worthless?

articles.title: Anthropic‚Äôs surprise settlement adds new wrinkle in AI copyright war
articles.summary: Anthropic's class action settlement with a group of U.S. authors this week was a first, but legal experts said the case's distinct qualities complicate the deal's potential influence on a wave of ongoing copyright lawsuits against other artificial-intelligence focused companies like OpenAI, Microsoft and Meta Platforms .

articles.title: Snowflake Gives Strong Outlook, Wiping Out Software Malaise Fear
articles.summary: Snowflake Inc. gave a sales outlook for the fiscal year that topped analysts‚Äô estimates, overcoming anxiety that software vendors will be hurt as the economy slows and new artificial intelligence companies take away business. The shares jumped in extended trading.

articles.title: Nvidia Gives Lackluster Forecast, Stoking Fears of AI Slowdown
articles.summary: Nvidia Corp., the world‚Äôs most valuable publicly traded company, gave a tepid revenue forecast for the current period, fueling concerns that a massive run-up in artificial intelligence spending is slowing.
